summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1913, for the improvement of Market Street from Twentieth Avenue Northwest to Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, and Fourteenth Avenue Northwest from Market Street to West Sixty-third Street, all in the City of Seattle , by planking the same with an eighteen-foot roadway, under Ordinance No. 19768, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
